bibl.title: Ptolemeevskij Egipet. Avec résumé en anglais: Ptolemaic Egypt.
bibl.note: Fragment of the original Russian manuscript version (found at the Yale University Library in 1996) of the chapter about Ptolemaic Egypt issued in the CAH in 1928. (Text prepared for publication and annotated by Yu.N. LITVINENKO.)
ROSTOVTZEFF Michael I., Ptolemeevskij Egipet. Avec résumé en anglais: Ptolemaic Egypt.
